question.text: When overtaking at night, you should

explanation.text: Don’t overtake if there’s a possibility of a road junction, bend or brow of a bridge or hill ahead. There are many other possible hazards that may be difficult to see in the dark, so only overtake if you’re certain that the road ahead is clear. Don’t take a chance.

answer.text: wait until a bend so that you can see the oncoming headlights
sound your horn twice before moving out
beware of bends in the road ahead
